extDescription.message: List all images displayed on the current page

extDescText.message: Scroll down the main document until all images are displayed.

copyListBtnTooltip.message: Copy to the clipboard the list of absolute URLs of selected images

copyHtmlBtnTooltip.message: Copy to the clipboard an HTML snippet with 'img' tags for all selected images

copyScriptBtnTooltip.message: Copy to the clipboard an HTML snippet that creates an slideshow powered by galleria.io

msgDataCopied.message: The requested data has been copied to the clipboard. Use CTRL+V to paste it into your editor.
msgDataCopied.description: Notification to be shown when the data has been copied to the clipboard

previewImage.description: Caption of the dialog shown when thumbnails are clicked
